content: gray r1 7sc in am 7 r2 7inc 14 r3 1sc 1 increase 21 r4 4sc 1bo 4sc 1bo 11sc 21 r5 15sc 1bo 4sc 1bo 21 r6-r9 21 single_crochet 21 place the safety eyes between r2-r3 aligned r10 15sc 1bo 4sc 1bo 21 r11 3sc 1dec 2sc 1bo 1dec 3sc x2 1dec 1sc 17 r12 2sc 1dec x4 1sc 13 stuff evenly r13 1sc 1dec x4 1sc 9 r14 closed with the wool needle bow optional in pink in magic_ring 3ch 2dc 3ch slip_stitch 3ch 2dc 3ch slip_stitch close magic_ring leave a thread and wrap it around the center forming a bow secure ir by sewing ir with same thread sew or glue it to one of the ears to attach the key ring chain 8 or 10 chain in center of r7 close in the same point with a slip_stitch knot and slip the yarn overs @crochetfleuri crochet fleuri by mariana ¡eso es todo te agradezco por usar este patrón está hecho con mucho cariño recuerda que me puedes apoyar siguiendo mis redes y etiquetándome cualquier sugerencia es bienvenida a través de mi blog crochetfleuribymariana blogspot com si deseas apoyarme aún más puedes invitarme un café a través de ko-fi com/crochetfleuribymariana @crochetfleuri crochet fleuri by mariana that s all thank you for using this pattern it was made with love remember you can support me by following my social media and tagging me any suggestions are welcome through my blog crochetfleuribymariana blogspot com if you d like to support me further you can buy me a coffe through ko-fi com/crochetfleuribymariana @crochetfleuri crochet fleuri by mariana
